forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The night settles softly over Downtown San Francisco, draping the city in a modest blanket of clouds that diffuse the moonlight and embrace the cool air. The temperature lingers around a comfortable 56 degrees, with whispers of a gentle westerly breeze rustling treetops and stirring aimless thoughts. As dawn approaches, the clouds are expected to part, revealing a cheerful, mostly sunny day. The high will peak at a refreshing 64 degrees, only to descend into the 60s as afternoon unfurls; a brisk southwest wind will dance through the streets, occasionally gusting as if to remind you that summer isn't merely lazy warmth but also spirited freshness.

This morning, beneath the overcast sky, there’s a sense of gentle intrigue. While the day hints at vivid sunshine, the early hours hold a serene hush, with neighborhoods still wrapped in a dreamlike quiet. Dressing in layers seems wise, perhaps a light jacket to fend off the early chill, paired with something breathable—a nod to the warmth that is sure to emerge. Given the mild vibe of the morning, a stroll along the Embarcadero could awaken the senses, allowing the soft sounds of the bay to serve as a backdrop to your thoughts. Alternatively, meandering through local cafés for a comforting cup of coffee would embrace the day’s peaceful cadence. There’s magic in these quiet moments before the vitality of the day bursts forth, where one can savor the city’s charm in ordinary, unassuming rituals.
